</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />

<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 586</row>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You are trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9).
</row>

</column>

---

This lock of hair is wrapped around a twig twisted into the shape of a heart. Popular among many of Restov's explorers, traders, and mercenaries, often a person carries several _lover's knots_ on their person in case of emergency. While the original _lover's knots_ were specific rewards granted by a particularly flirtatious Swordlord to her favored agents, time has seen these talismans become much more widespread through southern Brevoy. When you activate a _lover's knot_, you regain 2d6 Hit Points. If you have the [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=760) feat, you instead regain 2d6+7 Hit Points.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
